description: Adjusts the writing style and tone of the AI's response. This decorator helps ensure that responses are appropriately styled for different audiences and contexts, from formal technical documentation to casual explanations.

parameters.name: style
parameters.description: The desired tone and style for the response

examples.usage:
+++Tone(style=technical)
Explain how garbage collection works in Python
examples.result: Provides a technically precise explanation using appropriate terminology
Delivers a relaxed, conversational explanation of atmospheric optics
